data.name: Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium: Mini-Album Track 14 - Mega Man: The Power Battle - Player Select
data.detailed_description:
Stand heroic and aloof while listening to the "Player Select" jingle from Mega Man: The Power Battle!

This tune will be instantly recognizable to any Mega Man 2 fans!

Don't miss out on this classic!
